content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Emilia Müller. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for an affordable apartment. I would like to pay 300 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 300 euros per month is quite low for a newly built apartment in the city center, Emilia. I'm sure you understand that I'm looking for a fair market price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 500 euros per month is more in line with what I was expecting, Emilia. However, I'm still not sure if it's the best offer I could get. Would you be open to negotiating a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am willing to pay 550 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 550 euros per month is closer to what I'm seeking, but I'd like to explore if we can reach an even better agreement. Would you be willing to go up to 600 euros per month? This would be a great deal for you, considering the proximity to all amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I agree to the price of 575 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Emilia, but 575 euros per month is not enough for me. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to reconsider and offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe that 575 euros per month is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Emilia. Since we cannot agree on a price, I will terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
